name: support-hub-deepseek
description: Welcome to **ProofOfWastedWork** and **NearMissToken** â€“ an innovative protocol that monetizes the "wasted" computational work from Bitcoin mining. This project leverages the idea that Bitcoin miners produce countless "near misses" (i.e., proofs-of-work that nearly satisfy Bitcoin's difficulty requirements) which are normally discarded. Our system rewards those wasted efforts with tokens on the Solana blockchain.
